name: Spider-Man PC FanGame
description:
Project made by me

Credit to Lewis Fiford for the Spider-Man character and swinging scripts

Basic Controls are:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Web Swing - Sprint

Left Click - Web Zip

Tab - Suit Changer

1 - Slow time

Esc - Quit

You will need a fairly good PC to play this at 60fps
